author: cbs8
title: 13 Days Until Halloween; WholesaleHalloweenCostumes.com Provides Creative DIY Costume and Makeup Ideas for Inspiration Halloween 2015
text:
WholesaleHalloweenCostumes.com announces a new creativity and inspiration Halloween Blog for individuals who want to personalize their Halloween costume and makeup looks this October.
Edison, NJ (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
WholesaleHalloweenCostumes.com announces a new website design filled with creative content for individuals who want to personalize their Halloween costume and makeup looks this October.
WholesaleHalloweenCostumes.com has worked with a group of talented designers and artists to develop a library of innovative Halloween costume ideas for children and adults. Costume ideas range from designs inspired by current events, popular movies and TV shows, and quirky and creative themes.
“We are busy posting one new Halloween costume design per day based on current events and pop culture,” says creative director Bob Mcklveen. “Whether you want to dress as Bob Ross, Colonel Sanders or Miranda Sings we have a creative team working to continue developing new designs until Halloween.”
All do-it-yourself content includes step-by-step instructions, design tips and makeup tutorials.
Costume and Makeup Tutorials can be seen at:
http://www.wholesalehalloweencostumes.com/blog/diy-costumes-and-makeup
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13027423.htm
